SELECT s.id as id, s.totalPrice as orderTotalPrice, p.time as salesDate, u.username as username, p.id as paymentId, t.name as ticketName FROM ticket_sales s JOIN payment p ON s.PAYMENT_ID = p.id JOIN payment_method m ON m.id = p.PAYMENTMETHOD_ID JOIN order_list o ON p.id = o.PAYMENT_ID JOIN users u ON u.id = o.USER_ID JOIN ticket_detail d ON d.PAYMENT_ID = p.id JOIN ticket t ON d.TICKET_ID = t.id where
AND p.time >= TO_DATE('2023-11-01','yyyy-MM-dd')
AND and p.time <= TO_DATE('2023-11-08','yyyy-MM-dd')+1
order by salesDate DESC
select sum(s.totalprice) as orderTotalPrice from ticket_sales s, payment p, order_list o where s.payment_id=p.id and p.id=o.payment_id
